content: A self-titled album released in 1984 by what 'Material Girl' singer became one of the best-selling albums of all time?

That would be Madonna, with her self-titled debut album released in 1983, not 1984. But perhaps you're thinking of "Like a Virgin," which came out in 1984 and was a massive success for her. Both albums were indeed groundbreaking and contributed significantly to her status as the "Material Girl."
